Metadata: Will you use metadata generated with your measurements by instrument software or other disciplinary metadata, e.g. MIFlowCyt for flow cytometry or MINSEQE for sequencing? For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata/life-sciences
